summary: I started making a blacksmith outfit and then it turned into this armor. This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear the different pieces as you choose.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Blacksmith Armor
Author: Edhildil
01,20,2014
ver1




[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

I started making a blacksmith outfit and then it turned into this armor.

This is a modular armor set based on my DMRA Oblivion body mods.You can wear the different pieces as you choose.

Craftable and improvable under leather catagory at a forge.

Non BBP on purpose; the breast coned out when I weighted this to BBP and it didnt look correct.

Uses vanilla textures.

The world model for the armor pieces looks like a book, and acts like one. That means if you drop one of the items it will look like a book and it will look like a book in your inventory. Why? Because it is funny.

Pieces include:

Top (Main piece, wear as a base)
Thong
Shorts
Jacket
Boots
Leggings
Belt

Some of these pieces are compatible with these other armor mods I recently made:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60857/?]Edhildils Helgenrogue Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60162/?]Edhildils Mermer Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61054/?]Edhildils Mrs Claus[/url]

mods in screenshots include:

Hair: Apachii SkyHair female pack
Skin: Sporty Sexy Sweat, SG Textures Renewal CBBE
Eyes: The Eyes of Beauty



[youtube]OyIf7_ZO0sY[/youtube]
[img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/3664/updatesb.png[/img]

If someone wants to convert this to Bodyslide 2 or another body type go for it. It would be nice to make it mod dependant though so please keep that in mind. I have no idea how to use Outfit Studio.

[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Calientes CBBE body mod installed and running in your game.(textures)


 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location
Check folder paths and make adjustments if needed
copy/paste into Skyrim folder.



Uninstallation:

Delete Data_meshes_armor_edhildil_blacksmith folder
Delete Data_textures_armor_edhildil_blacksmitharmor folder
Delete EdhildilsBlacksmithArmor esp. file


[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Caliente for CBBE
Edhildil for the armor
 

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2


Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.
author: Edhildil
